dialogue.text: We make it to the bar a short while later and I find that business has gotten even better since I slipped into seclusion. Probably because Sara has had less time to think about my penis.
I say that knowing full well that she was beginning to turn things around even prior to my temporary disappearance. And I’m proud of her for what she’s been able to accomplish within that time.
But I can’t help but let some air out of the egotistical half of my brain in realizing just how much better off even the adults in Kumon-mi would be without me.
My psyche comes crashing down to earth and blends in with wine stains on the deep, red carpet covering this aging bar- and it crawls away before I’m able to scoop it back up.
Here’s hoping someone in need of a little boost takes it and swallows it.
I’d recommend Sana under normal circumstances, but I’m beginning to think she may have already consumed a piece of me sometime between when my life was okay and now.
Either that or she’s been possessed.
I just struggle to believe it’s {i}growth{/i} at all when she’s done nothing to incite it.
People don’t get better by simply existing. If anything, that just wears a person down.
And unless this aspect of her personality has been clawing at the lid of the casket she sleeps in for as long as I’ve known her, I’m not sure who she is makes much sense to me.
But I guess it doesn’t have to so long as being near her doesn’t make me want to buy myself my own deathbed.
Hey...I’m back...
Sorry it took so long, but...to make up for it...I brought somebody with me...

Is Ayane here again? Good. Get her a uniform from the back room and have her take care of the women in the back. Like...the back table. Don’t let her take any women into the back room. She’s too young.
Um...do you maybe want to...{i}look{/i} at who I brought with me?...
Sana, we’re swamped right now. I don’t have time to-
Ah! Wha- ahh?!?! When?! How?! Why?! Hello?!
Hello.
Do you...still want me to...get a uniform for him? Because I can try, but...I don’t think we have any that will fit...
Forget the uniform! What’s going on?! Where have you been?! Are you okay?!
I’m procrastinating, I’ve been at home, and no.
Well...is there anything I can do to help? I’ve been worried sick, you know. I don’t exactly have a successful track record when it comes to teachers disappearing on me.
That...has only happened one time before...
Yes, but you shouldn’t make jokes because it is also the reason you exist in the first place.

dialogue.character: Frank: Friend of Takoyaki Son, Son of Takoyaki Man
dialogue.text: Hey, Tony...isn’t that the guy from the theme park? The one who showed up with that girl who made you nervous?

dialogue.character: Tony: Takoyaki Son, Son of Takoyaki Man
dialogue.text: What? Where do you-

dialogue.character: Tony: Takoyaki Son, Son of Takoyaki Man
dialogue.text: FUCK, HE’S GOT A DIFFERENT ONE WITH HIM THIS TIME! FUCK YOU, MAN! FUCK YOU!!!!

dialogue.character: Frank: Friend of Tony: Takoyaki Son, Son of Takoyaki Man
dialogue.text: Dude, calm down. You're doing it again.
Hey! This is a violence-free zone!
Ugh, seriously? I’m getting out of here.
Yeah...looks like we’ll just have to spar elsewhere.
When did this become such a popular hub for extras?
Probably last Christmas. Yuki makes an excellent Manhattan.
Wonderful. Thanks, Matthew.
When did you meet Matthew?
I can’t really explain it, but I feel like he’s always just kind of been there.
That’s cool. But you know who {i}hasn’t{/i} been there?
Am I in trouble? Because I wasn’t even planning on coming inside and I’m just going to go home if you’re going to yell at me.
Your sentence lasted too long and now I feel weird responding to my own question. So I’m just going to say welcome back and not bother lecturing you since I’m sure it couldn’t be helped.
Sensei’s...still not doing all that well...so if we could maybe...give him a discount tonight...he could drink and...it would help take his mind off of things...
Why are you trying to get me drunk?
Because it’s the only way my mom ever taught me how to deal with my problems...
And it’s an excellent idea, Sana. There is no sadness that can not be battled by the abuse of certain substances!
Just don’t say that around Yuki because addiction is a slippery slope and I don’t want her reverting to old habits when she’s finally doing really well.
I am in no place or state of mind to tell you how to raise {i}anyone,{/i} but I will accept a discount and experiment with your methods tonight as nothing else helps anymore.
Why make it a {i}discount?{/i} Why not just let you drink anything you want tonight on the house?
Because that’s a terrible business decision and you have employees to pay.
Not tonight, I don’t! Everybody out! The bar is closing early!
Finally, a level of self-destructiveness and reckless abandon that I can relate to. All of the compassion I’ve been shown today was starting to make me nauseous.
Is it...really okay if we close early? The bar is...almost full right now...

dialogue.character: Tony: Takoyaki Son, Son of Takoyaki Man
dialogue.text: THIS FUCKING GUY RUINS EVERYTHING HE TOUCHES!!!!!
Do you...know that man, Sensei?...
I don’t think so. But based on that description, he knows me very well.

I repeat, loyal patrons of Sakaki-bar-a! The bar is closing early! Finish your drinks, settle your tabs, then drunkenly wander home! You’re all way too hammered to drive, so you can have your keys back tomorrow.
But my house key is attached to my-
Should’ve thought about that earlier, Taco Man!
Looks like I’m sleeping in the subway again...
If...we’re not working...can I go upstairs with Sensei now?...
Of course! But don’t think you’ll be alone for long since I’m getting these people out of here as soon as possible.
You can...take your time if you want...I don’t mind...being alone with him...
That’s what I used to say. Then, the next thing I knew, there was a little Sana growing inside of me.
Ew...why?...
Because when a man puts his penis in a woman’s vagina-
What? No!...I meant why would you say that?
Because if I don’t teach you how it works, I’ll never have a granddaughter to-
Okay...time to go upstairs, Sensei...
Sana grabs me by the wrist and drags me toward the stairs — which is a thing I never thought I’d be able to say several cycles ago.
It feels like just the other day she could barely make eye contact with me. But now, she’s treating me like some kind of...boyfriend that she’s dragging back to her house for the millionth time.
I’m welcome here. I’m {i}wanted{/i} here. And I feel as if I could come and go without making or breaking someone’s life.

That’s more than I can say about home right now. But that’s exactly why it’s so wrong for me to allow myself a comfortable night in with a family I’m not a part of- despite how badly they may {i}want{/i} me to be.
I wonder if they’d take Ami as well...if they’d let the {i}two{/i} of us infiltrate their already-fractured home by mistakenly believing we won’t damage it any further.
But just thinking that alone makes me sick to my stomach as I’m treating my niece like a piece of luggage instead of the wonderful girl I know she is.

And right now, I’m more concerned with not having her bump into strangers’ legs on the subway. Or avoiding the stutter-step I’d make if her wheels get locked on a rogue pebble in the middle of the street.
Sara makes her way up the creaky staircase and joins us after ten minutes or so.
She changes into her pajamas immediately, grabbing a half-empty bottle of wine off the kitchen counter and a few beers for Sana and me.
I shouldn’t drink. Not when I know my head’s already falling off my shoulders. But I also shouldn’t sleep with teenagers or jerk off to the memories of dead girls and that’s never stopped me before.
What’s one more mistake in a life that’s practically made of them? What about a hundred? A thousand?
Retreating toward the glow of normalcy would stand out far more than another bad decision, so I take solace in a {i}different{/i} glow — a purple one from a table with built in LEDs.
It blends in with the light from the city outside of the apartment....and I find myself existing in a place that feels more like something out of a dream than my actual {i}dreams{/i} do.
Sara lit candles.
They’re scented.
Sakura again.
There is no escape.
So, does this mean you’re going to start coming around again? Or should I prepare myself for another two months of complete loneliness?
You had Sana, didn’t you? And Yuki. And Maki and Haruka. And more customers than I’ve ever seen in here before. Why is it {i}my{/i} existence you need to steer yourself away from loneliness?
Because you’re the one I like the most.
Hey.
Other than you, sweetie. You know you’ll always be first in my heart.
That’s...not how you made it sound just now...
I just mean that I can connect with you in a way that I can’t connect with Sana.
Gross.
Not like that. But also like that if you want.
Gross times two.
Thanks, Sara.
I can’t say whether or not I’m going to start “coming around again,” though. I need...some more time to figure out what I want to do with myself.
You mean...{i}apart{/i} from teaching?
Sensei is...taking a break from teaching for a little while...
What?! Really?!

I’m taking a break from everything. I shouldn’t even be {i}here{/i} right now. And if it weren’t for me having a soft spot for Sana and a...different kind of spot for Ami, I probably {i}wouldn’t{/i} be.
Is...something going on with Ami too?
She’s...completely lost it...
She gave a whole speech today on...how all of us are just...trying to steal Sensei away from her...and it...may have involved a little...um...dismemberment?...
Your niece got in front of the class and said she was going to dismember the rest of the girls?
In layman’s terms, yes.
Well, I’d probably need some time off after that as well.
Do you want {i}me{/i} to talk to her? She could probably use a mother figure in her life, right?
Subtle, Mom...
I’m serious, though. A little heart to heart might be good for her. Having just one other member in your family can be super scary.
Like, I’d probably never {i}stop{/i} worrying if Sana was out talking to boys since I’d be scared they’d be luring her away from me. So, in a sense, I’m {i}glad{/i} most of them went to space.
And I’m...going to pretend that’s not a little...overprotective...
It’s a good idea, Sara...but I’m not sure if that would help her. Especially not when she’d likely just interpret it as you trying to get closer to me.
It’s like...nobody else can even {i}talk{/i} to me at this point without setting her off. And I think something is seriously wrong this time.
She’s always been clingy. But lately, it’s gotten out of control. And I don’t want it to ruin the relationships she has with everyone else since I...{i}can’t{/i} always be there for her.
But I feel like I {i}should{/i} since she’s always there for me.
That...does sound kind of tough...
I get it, though. But I’m not sure if I have any better advice to give than just maybe trying to get some outside help. Do you think she’d be open to therapy?
Not until she’s willing to acknowledge that there’s something wrong. And she’s convinced that everyone {i}else{/i} is crazy...not her.
Yeah...
Yeah...that’ll happen.
A moment of silence goes by.
Then another.
Then another, as we each take a sip from our drinks.
Then another.
Then another.
Until one of us can’t drink any more.
And the other two of us are at the ends of our ropes.
Or at least that’s what I {i}thought.{/i}
Nh...
You’re making those noises on purpose, aren’t you?
Huh?...Did you...say something?...
Sorry, I...must have dozed off...
So you were just {i}subconsciously{/i} opening your eyes to see if I was looking at you?
Looks like...I was caught...
Looks like it.
You know...
She’s not going to wake up...
And you’ve been drinking...so it wouldn’t be...that unusual if...you were to...maybe...make a {i}bad{/i} decision...
Right?...
Or maybe...you want {i}me{/i} to be the one who makes a {i}bad{/i} decision?...
Is that what you want, Sensei?...
Sana...
What's wrong?...
Don't you want me to make you...{i}feel good?...{/i}
Is this just what you’re going to be like now?
What do you mean?...
What do you think I mean?
Maybe I’ve always been like this and you just didn’t want to believe it?...
Maybe. Or maybe something’s changed.
Does it really matter either way? You want me...don’t you?...
You think {i}I’m{/i} cute...I think {i}you’re{/i} cute...
And your fingers are much bigger than mine...you can reach deeper than I can...
You want me to suck it?...
You’re probably pent up after all that time away, aren’t you?...
What happened at the Halloween party?
You...
You don’t...
You don’t remember?...
I know...{i}something{/i} happened. I just don’t remember what.
I was kind of...blacked out for a lot of that night.
Well...you {i}were{/i} talking to someone who wasn’t actually there, so...I guess that makes sense...
You really...don’t remember any of the details, though?...
Not really...no...
Then...
Maybe I should try to remind you?...
